alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 20 at 6:50AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94) affecting Cass County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Maple River near Enderlin affecting Ransom and Cass Counties. .Snowmelt is moving into the Maple River in Enderlin ND. Flood stage is expected to be reached after March 21st. For the Maple River...including Enderlin, Mapleton (South of I-94)... Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94). * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 18.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:15 AM CDT Sunday was 18.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.9 feet early Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
